positive_examples: This is an example of periodic system.
The periodic system demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed periodic system in this context.
A typical case of periodic system would involve these features.
The concept of periodic system applies here.
A dynamical system that returns to its initial state after a fixed time interval, repeating its behavior cyclically.
negative_examples: This is an example of multi stable system, not periodic system.
This represents dynamical system in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultiStableSystem, or other types of DynamicalSystem

definition: A dynamical system that returns to its initial state after a fixed time interval.
